name: Arena Glory
info: Prove your combat prowess in the arena by completing all challenges and defeating the champion.
accept: I'm ready to prove myself in the arena!
decline: The arena seems too dangerous for me right now.

objectives.description: Pay the arena entry fee of 500 gold
Win the one-on-one duel in Round 1
Survive the team battle for 5 minutes (Round 3)
Challenge and defeat the arena champion

dialogs: Welcome to the arena! Seeking glory in combat?
Entry fee is 500 gold. You must pass each round to proceed to the next.
Round 1 is a one-on-one duel. Are you ready?
The beasts are being released! Be careful!
The current champion awaits your challenge.
Incredible! You are the new champion!
